CIPHER.281.cipherString: What I learned is that in business you must make decisions based on facts, not react with your heart.
CIPHER.281.question: A quote by Mario Andretti has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.281.author: Mario Andretti

CIPHER.280.cipherString: Thinking too well of people often allows them to be better than they otherwise would.
CIPHER.280.question: A quote by Nelson Mandela has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has PEOPLE somewhere in it.
CIPHER.280.author: Nelson Mandela

CIPHER.273.cipherString: Puedes verlo, pero en realidad no está allí. Al igual que el final de un arco iris, el horizonte es una ilusión.
CIPHER.273.question: A quote by Holly Ringland which has been translated to Spanish has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. It has been encoded using a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.
CIPHER.273.author: Holly Ringland
CIPHER.273.translation: You can see it, but it's not really there. Just like the end of a rainbow, the horizon is an illusion.

CIPHER.268.cipherString: One thought cannot awake without awakening others.
CIPHER.268.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Marie Ebner-Eschenbach using a Baconian cipher.  What did they say?
CIPHER.268.author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

CIPHER.277.cipherString: Sometimes it's important to wake up and stop dreaming. When a really great dream shows up, grab it
CIPHER.277.question: A quote by Larry Page has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.277.author: Larry Page

CIPHER.274.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 569 461261 8703 . What do they decode to?

CIPHER.269.cipherString: Ethics is doing the right thing when no one is watching, especially when you think no one ever will.
CIPHER.269.question: A quote by Kuruvilla Pandikattu has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.269.author: Kuruvilla Pandikattu

CIPHER.276.cipherString: Wisdom becomes flawed when knowledge is in the wrong hands.
CIPHER.276.question: A quote by Anthony T. Hincks has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with WISDOM.
CIPHER.276.author: Anthony T. Hincks

CIPHER.264.cipherString: The progressive development of man is vitally dependent on invention.
CIPHER.264.question: The following quote by Nikola Tesla needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of EQUAL and polybius key of UNSCRIPTED.
CIPHER.264.author: Nikola Tesla

CIPHER.279.cipherString: In any case, we do not advance the human cause by refusing to consider ideas that make us frightened.
CIPHER.279.question: A quote by Carl Sagan has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told that the second word decodes to be “ANY”
CIPHER.279.author: Carl Sagan

CIPHER.261.cipherString: Nature was neither fair nor unfair. Those terms belonged to the world of men.
CIPHER.261.question: A quote by Carsten Jensen has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has ETERMS somewhere in it.
CIPHER.261.author: Carsten Jensen

CIPHER.266.cipherString: Man little knows what calamities are beyond his patience to bear till he tries them.
CIPHER.266.question: The following quote by Oliver Goldsmith needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of BUSILY and polybius key of STUMBLING.
CIPHER.266.author: Oliver Goldsmith

CIPHER.260.cipherString: Life is a compromise of what your ego wants to do, what experience tells you to do, and what your nerves let you do.
CIPHER.260.question: A quote by Walter Bagehot has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K1 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.260.author: Walter Bagehot

CIPHER.265.cipherString: Never act in breach of trust.
CIPHER.265.question: Decode the following quote by Basava which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of BOAR.
CIPHER.265.author: Basava

CIPHER.262.cipherString: To me, thee greatest lpeasure of writign si not hwat its about, ubt the inner umsic that words make.
CIPHER.262.question: A friend of yours tried to encode quote by Truman Capote as an Aristocrat using a K2 alphabet.  However they turn out to be a terrible speller and typist.  What did they encode?
CIPHER.262.author: Truman Capote

CIPHER.270.cipherString: Dreaming is the fuel in the car of dedication!
CIPHER.270.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Todd Stocker using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text starts with DREAM
CIPHER.270.author: Todd Stocker

CIPHER.267.cipherString: I want to do more documentaries and travel to places I haven't been. That is where I think I can be fulfilled.
CIPHER.267.question: A quote by Tatjana Patitz has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K2 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.267.author: Tatjana Patitz

CIPHER.272.question: Decode the following quote by Louise Berliawsky Nevelson which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of TOLD.
CIPHER.272.author: Louise Berliawsky Nevelson

CIPHER.278.cipherString: For years, I struggled with dyslexia. Mostly because I was spelling it wrong.
CIPHER.278.question: The following quote needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of DEPTH

CIPHER.275.cipherString: When a change occurs in Nature, the quantity of action necessary for that change is as small as possible.
CIPHER.275.question: Hard K2 Aristocrat without a Hint Quote Author: Pierre Louis Maupertuis
CIPHER.275.author: Pierre Louis Maupertuis

CIPHER.259.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 6 21443 98675. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.271.cipherString: Acting is also working with people who invite you into their dreams and trust you with their innermost being.
CIPHER.271.question: A quote by Catherine Deneuve has been encoded using the K3 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K3 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.271.author: Catherine Deneuve

CIPHER.263.cipherString: Gratitude is merely the secret hope of further favors.
CIPHER.263.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Francois de La Rochefoucauld using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.263.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
